name: War Weary
text: Give to the Richard Rider player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: * Exhaust Richard Rider → remove War Weary from the game. * Discard half the cards in your hand rounded down. Discard War Weary.

flavor: “All serve Annihilus! Annihilus is the will and the way and he WILL NOT BE DENIED!”
name: Annihilus
text: [star] Forced Response: After Annihilus activates against you, if Annihilation Wave is in play, put the top card of your deck into play facedown, engaged with you as an [[ARTHROSIAN]] minion.

name: Bring Annihilation
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for Annihilation Wave and put it into play. Shuffle the encounter deck. Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as an [[ARTHROSIAN]] minion.

name: Annihilation Wave
text: Each facedown [[ARTHROSIAN]] minion engaged with a player has a base SCH of 0, a base ATK of 2, and a base hit points of 1. Forced Response: After an [[ARTHROSIAN]] minion is defeated, place that card in it's owners discard pile.

name: Armies of Annihilus
text: When Revealed: Put the top 2 cards of your deck into play facedown engaged with you as an [[ARTHROSIAN]] minion. If you cannot, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: Put the top card of your deck into play facedown, engaged with you as an [[ARTHROSIAN]] minion.
